channel.title: Accepting jobs
channel.description:
If anyone needs to make money by using skills like crafting, which i need to lvl up drastically in, just give me the supplies needed and i can craft stuff for you. i won't take anything you give me, seeing that i will get banned for stealing items that aren't worth much. if anyone needs me to craft stuff for them, add my main ( brownieman02 ) and i can help ya out.
p.s. if you want me to make amulets of def, str, or magic, ill need you to give me the gold bars or ores and the gems associated with the kind of amulet you want to be made.

item.title: Accepting jobs
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

well those 2 ideas are good and all, but im unfortunately not a member. i just need the experience points, cus im tryin to get to lvl 50 crafting…

Read full topic

item.title: Accepting jobs
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

pko:

make me an onyx amulet, and enchant it.

and then give it to me.
But seriously if you want to get up crafting… go to the flax fields, pick 1k flax, make them into strings and sell for 200k, its more fast then you would think

Then buy 2k flax and make that into 2k strings and you will have 400k. And it isn’t as boring as you’d think.

Read full topic
